description: A Nanotrasen NewComm branded vessel serving as a telecommunications provider to ships across the sector, the Dial-class works to both expand Nanotrasen cohesion in the frontier and to market telecommunications machines to prospective buyers. The Dial-class utilizes engineering equipment to provide machinery installation for improved customer satisfaction. Nanotrasen private security positions can be found onboard the Dial-class to oversee asset safety and handling.
